## getScriptPath() function

Get the absolute path to a script file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getScriptPath(relativePath: string): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

relativePath

</td><td>

string

</td><td>

Path relative to the scripts directory (e.g., "helpers/json.applescript")

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

Absolute path to the script file

## Exceptions

If the path attempts to traverse outside the scripts directory

## Example

```typescript
const path = getScriptPath("helpers/json.applescript");
// Returns: "/path/to/dist/scripts/helpers/json.applescript"
```
